title: "Data Import"
output: github_document

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse) #ggplot, readr, tibble
```

## Read in some data 

Read in the litters dataset.
```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df) #use janitor package里面的clean_names function
```


## Take a look at the data

Printing in the console.

```{r}
litters_df
```

```{r}
tail(litters_df) #check the tail of your dataset
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(litters_df) #skim mean, sd, Q1234, histogram look like
```


## options to read_csv

check out `?read_csv()` for more information
```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv", skip = 10, col_names = FALSE)

```

```{r}
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv", skip = 10, na = c("", "NA", ".", 999))
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
```

## Other file formats
Rread in an excel file
```{r}
library(readxl)
mlb_df = read_excel("./data/mlb11.xlsx")
mlb_df
```
